headline.main: NEW MOSCOW PERIL; Defenders Exhorted to Spur Effort as Nazi Pincers Widen

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Friday, Nov. 28 -- "Hold we must -- and will -- through these next few days of strain if we are to make of this final thrust of the enemy the turning point for his final defeat. We must check the enemy's offensive and bleed him white."
abstract: New Moscow peril seen; Germans widen pincers drive; USSR admits threat; Germans drive toward Ryazan; USSR submarines sink 1 Axis tanker and 5 transports; map
